name: You are not the hero...
description:
The Hero (not you) is not very smart, so he only moves towards the closest object he sees 

You can drag'n'drop shaking items to help him navigate to stairs

Press "play" buttom to make him move and if he is stuck or dead press "restart"

Known bugs:

  • Title screen is black
  • The Hero gets stuck sometimes
  • Key in level 3 functions like armor
